content: this smooshy cushion cover is worked in the round it has a series of cables both thick and thin on the front and the back is worked in moss stitch to add texture a moss stitch button flap means the cover is removable for cleaning i suggest using the smooshiest cuddliest yarn you can find i ve had some reports that there is a problem with the download - if you re unable to download here on ravelry i ve now published the pattern on my blog here 1 1 http //emmafolds blogspot com/2010/12/smushion-pattern html
